Package com.github.actionfx.core.dialogs

Class DialogController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.actionfx.core.dialogs.DialogController
  • public class DialogController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller for working with simple dialogs like confirmation-, information-, warning-, error-, file handling- and text input dialogs.
    Author:
    koster

    • Method Detail

      • showConfirmationDialog

        public boolean showConfirmationDialog​(java.lang.String title,
                                      java.lang.String headerText,
                                      java.lang.String contentText)
        Displays a modal confirmation dialogue with the specified title and message.
        Parameters:
        title - the title of the dialog
        headerText - the header text to be displayed in the dialog
        contentText - the content text to be displayed in the dialog
        Returns:
        true, when the OK button has been pressed, false otherwise.

      • showWarningDialog

                              java.lang.String contentText)
        Displays a modal warning dialogue with the specified title and message.
        Parameters:
        title - the title of the dialog
        headerText - the header text to be displayed in the dialog
        contentText - the content text to be displayed in the dialog

      • showDirectoryChooser

        public java.io.File showDirectoryChooser​(java.lang.String title,
                                         java.io.File defaultDirectory,
                                         javafx.stage.Window owner)
        Displays a directory chooser and returns the selected File descriptor.
        Parameters:
        title - the dialog title
        defaultDirectory - the directory to show, when the dialog is opened
        owner - the window owner
        Returns:
        the selected directory, or null, if no directory has been selected

      • showFileOpenDialog

        public java.io.File showFileOpenDialog​(java.lang.String title,
                                       java.io.File defaultDirectory,
                                       java.lang.String initialFileName,
                                       javafx.stage.FileChooser.ExtensionFilter fileExtensionFilter,
                                       javafx.stage.Window owner)
        Displays a file chooser and returns the selected File descriptor.
        Parameters:
        title - the dialog title
        defaultDirectory - the directory to show, when the dialog is opened
        initialFileName - the initially suggested file name
        fileExtensionFilter - an optional file extension filter
        owner - the window owner
        Returns:
        the selected file, or null if no file has been selected

      • showFileOpenDialog

        public java.io.File showFileOpenDialog​(java.lang.String title,
                                       java.io.File defaultDirectory,
                                       javafx.stage.Window owner)
        Displays a file chooser and returns the selected File descriptor.
        Parameters:
        title - the dialog title
        defaultDirectory - the directory to show, when the dialog is opened
        owner - the window owner
        Returns:
        the selected file, or null, if no file has been selected

        Parameters:

      • showFileSaveDialog

        public java.io.File showFileSaveDialog​(java.lang.String title,
                                       java.io.File defaultDirectory,
                                       java.lang.String initialFileName,
                                       javafx.stage.FileChooser.ExtensionFilter fileExtensionFilter,
                                       javafx.stage.Window owner)

        defaultDirectory - the directory to show, when the dialog is opened
        initialFileName - the initially suggested file name
        fileExtensionFilter - an optional file extension filter
        owner - the window owner

      • showTextInputDialog

        public java.lang.String showTextInputDialog​(java.lang.String title,
                                            java.lang.String headerText,
                                            java.lang.String contentText)
        Displays a modal TextInputDialog that lets the user enter a single string value.
        Parameters:
        title - the title of the input dialog
        headerText - a header text to be displayed inside the dialogue
        contentText - a content text displayed in front of the input text field
        Returns:
        the entered string value, or null, if no value has been entered.

      • showTextInputDialog

        public java.lang.String showTextInputDialog​(java.lang.String title,
                                            java.lang.String headerText,
                                            java.lang.String contentText,
                                            java.lang.String defaultValue)
        Displays a modal TextInputDialog that lets the user enter a single string value. A default text is already pre-set.
        Parameters:
        title - the title of the input dialog
        headerText - a header text to be displayed inside the dialogue
        contentText - a content text displayed in front of the input text field
        defaultValue - the pre-set default text
        Returns:
        the entered string value, or null, if no value has been entered.
